posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: h1 Heading 8-)CodeInline code Indented code // Some comments line 1 of code line 2 of code line 3 of codeBlock code “fences” 1Sample text here... Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 测试文章
posts.text: issue 数据库使用步骤 目前博客中，所有的动态数据都放到 issue 中了。 扩展一下对于有些爱 总结静态博客的动态数据是个痛点，GitHub Issue 有很多可利用的地方。多去探索发掘其中的奥妙。
